pan_be_COMErrorObject_init_t Struct Reference
[Pantheios COM Error Object Stock Back-end]

#include <pantheios/backends/bec.COMErrorObject.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Structure used for specifying initialisation information to the be.COMErrorObject library.

Public Attributes

pan_uint32_t version
pan_uint32_t flags

Member Data Documentation

pan_uint32_t version

Must be initialised to the value of PANTHEIOS_VER

pan_uint32_t flags

Flags that control the information displayed.
